title: Step 27

challengeFiles.name: index
challengeFiles.contents: CSS Color Markers
challengeFiles.seed: CSS Color Markers

challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: Your .container CSS rule should have a background-color property set to rgb(255, 255, 255).

description:
Now that you have the primary RGB colors, it's time to combine them.

For the rgb function in the .container rule, set the red, green, and blue values to the max of 255.
